snippet: The companies announced an extensive, multiyear deal that includes granting Amazon exclusive rights to Nickelodeon’s preschool shows.
abstract: Viacom and Amazon announce extensive, multiyear deal that grants Amazon exclusive rights to Nickelodeon's preschool programming; agreement, estimated to be worth several hundred million dollars, is Amazon's biggest streaming deal to date, signalling heated battle for online rights has moved to television's youngest viewers.
lead_paragraph: The companies announced an extensive, multiyear deal that includes granting Amazon exclusive rights to Nickelodeon’s preschool shows.

headline.seo: Viacom Strikes Deal With Amazon to Stream Children’s Shows
headline.main: In Viacom Deal, Amazon Scoops Up Children’s Shows
headline.print_headline: Viacom Strikes an Extensive Deal With Amazon to Stream Children’s Shows
